issue.title: [Gandiva][C++] Utilize common bitmap operation implementations in precompiled IR routines
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3402](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3402). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It should be possible to use common inline/header-only implementations of bitmap operations in Gandiva functions which are being precompiled to LLVM IR

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3402?focusedCommentId=16641434) by Pindikura Ravindra (pravindra):*
This was fixed as part of the changes for ARROW-3382.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3402?focusedCommentId=16641435) by Pindikura Ravindra (pravindra):*
This was fixed as part of the changes for ARROW-3382.
